article: The Best Ways to Make People Laugh
intro: They say laughter is the best medicine, so how can you give it out? Making someone laugh may seem like a feat, but it’s way easier than you may think! We’ve put together a list of ways you can make just about anyone LOL. From vocal humor to physical comedy, we’ve got it all, so keep reading to learn how to get someone to giggle.

steps.title: Comment on a relatable truth.
steps.subtitle: Stick to things you and the other person have in common: traits, relationships, and struggles. Not only is this a good way to cause a smile, but it can also help you bond. Here are some examples:
sub-points: You never realize how long a minute is until you’re exercising.
Sometimes, the older siblings need an older sibling.
It’s only Tuesday and I feel like dying.
Not sure if I have extra money or forgot to pay the bills.

steps.subtitle: Consider pranking a close friend or family member to make them laugh. Now, this type of comedy isn’t for the faint of heart, as it could be taken the wrong way, but it can also be a lot of fun. Stick to jokes that aren’t too invasive or mean. Remember, you want them to laugh, not cry!
sub-points: Put salt in your roommate’s coffee instead of sugar.
Rearrange your family’s kitchen drawers.
Replace your mom’s framed photos with photos of a celebrity.
Cover your dad’s office with sticky notes.
Place a fake snack in your friend’s car.
Put tape over the TV remote’s sensor.
Put tape on a computer mouse sensor.
